caption.p: Synthesis of biodiesel from soybean oil and ethanol using different preparations of Thermomyces lanuginosus lipase (14 U/ g of oil) in the presence of silica and added water in solvent free medium. 0.5 g oil was used for the reaction and 140 μL ethanol was added so that oil: ethanol ratio is 1:4. 20% (w/w) silica and 2% (w/w) water was added. The reaction was carried out at 40 °C at 200 rpm. Aliquots were taken at different intervals and analysed by GC. The reaction was carried out in duplicates and the error within each set was within ±3%.
